wikipedia_page.main: Gertrude Macdonald or Biddy Jamieson (1871 – 1952) was an English painter. Her husband was the Scottish painter Alexander Jamieson.Macdonald was born and trained in England but moved to Paris where she met and married her husband. They married in 1907. Her work Portrait of the Lady Alix Egerton was included in the book Women Painters of the World.

response: * Gertrude Macdonald or Biddy Jamieson (1871–1952), English painter
